class.name: XmlReport
class.description: A [build feature](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/xml-report-processing.html) parses xml report produced by external tools and present them as build results

function.name: xmlReport

param.name: xmlReportParsing.reportDirs
param.description: Newline- or comma-separated set of rules specifying where to find reports in the form of +|-:path. Ant-style wildcards are supported.

param.name: xmlReportParsing.verboseOutput
param.description: Enables verbose output to the build log

param.name: xmlReportParsing.findBugs.home
param.description: A path to FindBugs installation on the agent if the XmlReportType.FINDBUGS reportType
